name: run-in-separate-pgrp
description: Launch a console command in a newly created foreground process group

scripts.test-psql-unwrapped: echo 'Press ^C: it will kill "yarn psql", which is bad.'; echo; exec psql
scripts.test-psql-no-forward: echo 'Press ^C: it will NOT kill psql, which is good!'; echo; exec ./run-in-separate-pgrp psql
scripts.test-psql: echo 'Press ^C: it will NOT kill psql, which is good!'; echo; exec ./run-in-separate-pgrp --forward-signals-to-group --print-signals psql
scripts.test-sleep: echo 'Run "killall -TERM perl" in another console...'; echo; exec ./run-in-separate-pgrp --forward-signals-to-group --print-signals bash -c 'sleep 100 & sleep 200 & sleep 300'
